description:
According to Joy Reid, "massive cuts to eviscerate federal agencies" are bad because the president should only embody the bureaucracy, not fight it.

Reid claimed that DOGE will lead to “unregulated financial markets, polluted air and water, and raw unpasteurized milk, likely without Obamacare to help you out at the ER."

Joy Reid is salty that DOGE is going to fix the federal government, and $DOGE just happens to be Elon Musk favorite crypto currency. She even claims that we will have to drink raw milk. DOGE is already winning 😆 🤣 pic.twitter.com/Q0r8EZS7Mz
— TheÐogeGlory (@GloryDoge)
title: Watch: Joy Reid goes on MASSIVE rant on Elon Musk's DOGE, claims it will force you to drink raw milk

description:
According to the establishment, reports indicate this will be the cheapest Thanksgiving dinner in forty years. However, you don’t need to be an economist to believe your empty wallet and eyes.

According to the American Farm Bureau Federation survey, the average cost of a Thanksgiving dinner will be $50, five percent less than last year but remains nearly 20 percent higher than 2019.
title: Watch: How the elites are lying about Thanksgiving inflation

description:
Clips like this are why I was never on board with Scott Jennings being named Trump's press secretary. He's needed where he is on CNN, especially now that Ryan Girdusky got yeeted off of the network for making a hilarious joke about beepers. It's obvious not even people who are on CNN don't even watch CNN. Or, in the case of our favorite genderless potato head, Brian Stelter, watch Fox News 24/7. Last night, the panel accused Scott Jennings of spreading misinformation and demanded that he provide his source.

Jennings's source was CNN.

The topic started with the panel not finding the memes about Elon Musk buying MSNBC as funny as people who have a sense of hu
title: Watch: CNN panel accuses Scott Jennings of misinformation, but he was quoting data from CNN

description:
T-minus two days to T-Day & we’re seeing reports Thanksgiving dinner will be the cheapest in forty years, meanwhile President Donald Trump announced his plan for sweeping tariffs on Mexico and Canada, Special Counsel for the United States Department of Justice Jack Smith filed to drop charges in his federal case against the President, Americans want mass deportations, and more!

Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.
title: Sources: Debunking the Left’s Creative Math on the Cost of Thanksgiving Dinner
